definition: bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
(bird species of China) glossy ibis (Plegadis falcinellus)
(bird species of China) crested ibis (Nipponia nippon)
(bird species of China) white-shouldered ibis (Pseudibis davisoni)
(bird species of China) black-headed ibis (Threskiornis melanocephalus)

sentences.english: The crested ibis was declared extinct in Japan in the 1970s.
sentences.chinese: 二十世紀70年代在日本，朱䴉已被宣佈瀕絕。

sentences.english: A flock of white ibis stands in marsh grass on Dry Bread Island in St. Bernard Parish, Louisiana on Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 阿白䴉羊羣中的乾麪包草洲溼地站在聖伯納德教區。

sentences.english: In the worst-case scenario, the production of young would fall by 50 per cent.
sentences.chinese: 最壞的情況下，年輕白䴉的生育量會下降50%。
幾乎所有的䴉科鳥類都能飛，但“奇異朱鷺”不會飛。

sentences.english: The above-mentioned results indicate that Ningshan county is suitable for reintroduction test of the Crested Ibis.
sentences.chinese: 以上結果表明，寧陝縣適於開展朱䴉再引入試驗。

sentences.english: Some effective solutions to strengthen the Crested Ibis protection were put forward.
sentences.chinese: 並且提出了加強朱䴉保護的對策。

sentences.english: In fact, 7 wild crested ibis were found that time.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，當時在陝西也只發現了7只野生朱䴉。

sentences.english: Learn how to do the Ibis in this free video clip on Egyptian dancing.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解如何在這對埃及舞免費視頻剪輯䴉。
